data.name: Eternal Winter
data.detailed_description:
Take the role of a chief! Lead your village and explore a huge island full of wildlife. Build, hunt and gather resources, because storms are incoming and they will demand the most of your strategic skills.

You will also have to maintain a healthy balance in the ecosystem, do not over-hunt or else the delicate ecosystem will begin to collapse, and a damaged ecosystem means less meat for your village!


some features:
-Village management :use your villagers to craft, build and gather resources.
-Dog sled: 4 loyals dogs that will provide swift transportation, you just have to take care of their basic needs.
-Kayak!
-Storms: Storms that get more demanding as days go by, they will test your strategic skills as the leader of your village.
-Diverse wildlife: from raccoons to huge bears!
-online co-cop (still very buggy and unstable)

data.short_description: Take the role of a chief! Lead your village and explore a huge island full of wildlife. Build, hunt and gather resources, because storms are incoming and they will demand the most of your strategic skills.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 4xxx Series w/ 512MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any on-board chip will work
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5 quad core 2.60ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 555/ or 1gb VRAM
  • Sound Card: Anything with Surround capabilites

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.3
  • Processor: Core i5 @ 2.2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.3
  • Processor: Core i7 @ 2.7GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: standalone GPU with 1gb VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
